<<<<<<< HEAD
A survey of Naphtali. Part II discoursing of the heads proposed in the the preface of the former : together with an examination of the doctrines of the Apolog. narration concerning the king's supremacy in and about ecclesiastick affairs, and the obligation of the Covenants. Honyman, Andrew, 1619-1676.
[6], 271 p.
Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the King's most Excellent Majesty, Edinburgh : 1669.
"Published by order." Written by Andrew Honyman. Cf. Halkett & Laing. Errata: p. 271. Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
=======
